Description:
PERIOD GRACE, PRIME POSITION
FORTHCOMING AUCTION UNLESS SOLD PRIOR
This superbly maintained balcony terrace combines period warmth with modern comfort on the Clifton Hill-Fitzroy border, close to Brunswick Street, Queens Parade, the Edinburgh Gardens and schools. Elevated from the street, the house, featuring a tall pediment and lace-trimmed verandah, is immediately appealing. Entry is to an arched hallway, opening to a handsome formal sitting room (potentially a fourth bedroom) with wood-burning open fireplace and a view of the well-planted front garden. A large central formal dining room with study alcove leads back to a neat kitchen and a porch opening to the deep brick-paved courtyard garden (pedestrian ROW access), which houses a full-size laundry, storage shed and WC. Timber stairs lead up to the vast main bedroom, two further bedrooms, and a period-style bathroom. This inviting residence features hydronic heating, generous storage, and ornate period detail. Don't miss it!
Insights: 5 Hodgkinson Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Large & Light-Filled Village Victorian
In a premier inner-city position with dual John Street frontage, this captivating semi-detached Victorian offers the best of both worlds fusing classical character and contemporary extension for surprisingly spacious, secluded living. Step out and feel the vibe of the village with an array of nearby attractions including cafes, Darling Gardens, Queens Parade shopping, schools and Clifton Hill station. Opening to a sun-filled entertainment deck and courtyard garden, this superb single-storey home is introduced by a wide double-arched hall leading to three generous bedrooms, built-in-robes, vast open-plan living and dining area, impressive Smeg-equipped kitchen, central bathroom, European laundry, ducted heating, air-conditioning, polished Jarrah floors and new carpets plus remote-control carport.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978
Insights: 1 Grant Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Extra Width, Extra Scope, Extraordinary Village Opportunity
From the front it's exceptionally wide, from the rear it's privately peaceful and inside it's waiting for you to add your stylish touch. Altogether this freestanding three bedroom Victorian is a unique opportunity in a quiet pocket moments to endless expanses of parkland. With a single block-fronted skin and double-fronted heart, this welcoming soul is the best value in the village featuring 10m frontage, north-oriented rooms, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm and period charm near shops, cafes, schools and train station. Take advantage of the extra dimensions with a dream renovation of this comfortable home offering living room with wood heater, large kitchen and meals area, bathroom with spa bath, laundry, attic storage, solar heating panels, off street parking plus garage and sunny paved courtyard garden.
Julie Susnjara : 0408 006 662

Description:
SUPERCOOL 1970s STYLE
With a prime address opposite the tranquil Darling Gardens and close to Queens Pde and Clifton Hill Station, this streamlined apartment offers beautifully proportioned light-filled living just 15 minutes from the CBD. In a well-maintained block, here is a great first home or wise investment, comprising a spacious L-shaped living and dining room open to a stylish kitchen with Blanco range and generous cabinetry, two large bedrooms (BIRs), refitted bathroom and full laundry, plus balcony with CBD views, off-street parking and panel heating.

Description:
A significant inner city discovery!
Under Instructions From State Trustees. Surely amongst the most substantial Victorians in Clifton Hill, clearly one of the most impressive opportunities anywhere in the inner city circle, this evocative two storey residence reveals a hugely rewarding combination of period proportions and tempting potential. Separate downstairs living and dining rooms surrounding a serviceable kitchen/meals area are accompanied by an adaptable bedroom before leading to a generous outdoor backdrop that's entirely under cover. A functional bathroom, separate laundry and large store room reflect the traditional character of a home that also offers large upstairs dimensions throughout three further bedrooms, one currently configured as a second living room, a second bathroom and an additional kitchen. Ripe for renovation and re-modelling to ensure maximum enjoyment of proximity to Clifton Hill's village, the station, Quarries Park and Darling Gardens.
http://www.37grantstreetcliftonhill.com/
Quentin Hinrichs : 0419 387 703
Insights: 37 Grant Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
LOW MAINTENANCE, PRIME POSITION!
Here is the perfect home for downsizers and young professionals, brilliantly located on a deep block (37m. approx) metres from Yarra parkland and close to Village cafes, Clifton Hill Station, Queens Parade and schools. Built in Provincial style, 'Occiden' is a spacious single level modern home entered from a landscaped native garden. Filled with natural light, it offers three generous bedrooms (BIRs), a spacious living and dining room flowing through bifold doors to a pergola-covered deck and courtyard, a newly fitted kitchen with premium appliances and generous storage, and a large recently renovated tiled bathroom/laundry with separate bath and shower. Including a near-new workshop with second WC, and remote access off street parking from a wide right of way, this immaculate property features ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar hot water and premium appointments.
Insights: 39 Walker Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Delightful Outlook in Lifestyle Central...
Located within one of Clifton Hill’s favourite streets enjoying delightful eateries, parkland and a myriad of public transport options literally within strolling distance, this spacious 1970’s 2 bedroom apartment is located within a select block of only 6 featuring security entrance, delightful views, private balcony and an off street car space.
Ideal as a first property for the devoted inner city dweller or an astute investment purchase assured of excellent rental returns and future capital growth the apartment offers 2 double bedrooms with built in robes, spacious living/dining with access to balcony, functional kitchen with gas cooking, bathroom with shower over bath, laundry facilities and separate toilet.
Comfortable but ‘tired’ the apartment offers enormous scope for further improvement right in the heart of the Clifton Hill village... Outstanding!
Insights: 5/109 Spensley Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2014 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
CHECK THE POTENTIAL!
This solid brick modernised residence offers comfortable living now, with exciting possibilities for further improvement (STCA) on a deep block with second frontage to Lilly St. A versatile floorplan includes two very large bedrooms, spacious living and dining rooms, study/second living room opening to al fresco entertaining area, neat kitchen, tiled bathroom, separate WC and laundry. Features include generous storage, air conditioning and gas heating. And what a position this is - in the heart of the Village, just minutes to the station, schools and parkland.

Description:
SPACIOUS WAREHOUSE, PRIME LOCATION
A brilliant transformation from original button factory to boutique contemporary residence, this outstanding warehouse conversion delivers two-level living in a quiet and convenient 'local' village street. A fabulous low-maintenance and exciting alternative to an apartment or house, this spacious solid brick home represents an exceptional investment or owner-occupier opportunity in a great inner-city location remarkably close to Yarra River parklands, trails, cafes and Clifton Hill station. Includes two large bedrooms, BIRs, vast and versatile living and dining, plus study area all with abundant north light under a soaring steel beamed ceiling, kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, big bathroom, European laundry, heating, polished hardwood floors and direct access to communal courtyard. Miles Real Estate.
Gordon Whale : 0419 335 459

Address: 499 Hoddle Street (tree lined service road) CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068
Description:
Prized Family Accommodation
Step inside this classic Edwardian home and discover magnificently proportioned family accommodation including wide entry hall, exceptionally spacious living room with handsome bay window, impressive formal dining room, four double bedrooms and full Miele kitchen with adjacent meals area, sparkling bathroom (spa bath) and separate laundry. You will also love the location - just metres to the Darling Gardens, Collingwood Leisure Centre and all transport with a short walk to Clifton Hill primary School. Further features include four K.V. solar panel system, attic storage and period detailing including warm polished Baltic Pine floors, four original fire places and ornate timber and plasterwork. The easily accessed garage is a bonus. Home such as this are tightly held in Clifton Hill - seize the opportunity!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Description:
An irresistible cosmopolitan lifestyle
Instantly appealing, the sophisticated spaces of this 2 year old town residence are tucked away within a low-traffic pocket, just steps from enticing cafes, Merri Creek and the Yarra River.
Warm northern sunshine streams through the 2 levels. The upstairs open-plan living incorporates a stylish Caesarstone kitchen with European stainless steel appliances, generous dining and family room with split system air-conditioning and a broad balcony overlooking the quiet street.
Boasting high ceilings throughout, the master bedroom with built-in robes, split system air-conditioning and contemporary, pristine ensuite is accompanied by a 2nd double bedroom (BIR and air-conditioning) and a central bathroom.
Leave your car in the large single auto garage and explore this vibrant locale near fabulous eateries, train, bike trails and freeway.
- Near-new town residence just steps from Merri Creek and the Yarra
- High ceilings and abundant natural light throughout
- Open-plan dining and family room with broad balcony
- Caesarstone kitchen with European appliances
- Master bedroom with contemporary ensuite
- Enjoy vibrant cafes and restaurants
Terms: 10% deposit, balance 60 days

Description:
Voluminous Contemporary home on a 46m apx. deep garden allotment with double carport
Forthcoming auction (prior offers invited). Inspired designer living and effortless entertaining zones combine perfectly in this light filled and airy contemporary home superbly situated on a deep established garden allotment with double carport. Architect-designed and quality built, this stylish home showcases soaring oversize windows with leafy garden outlooks, high ceilings, city views and a versatile open-plan living environment in this popular inner-city convenience location near Merri Creek parkland, cafes and trains. The spacious accommodation includes: D/S - Stone tiled entrance foyer, Study/3rd Bedroom with BIRs & front garden views, full width living room leading to a dining area with very high ceilings & feature windows highlighting the side garden views, central laundry & powder room, modern s/steel finished kitchen & Smeg appliances with adjacent casual living room enjoying a gas coal fireplace & double doors opening to a rear entertainers deck and wonderfully serene Japanese inspired gardens. U/S: 2 large bedrooms (including master suite) both with marble lined bathrooms & built in robes plus study area and private balcony off the master suite. Other features include: Radiant panel heating, air-conditioning, alarm, polished floorboards, easy car access to carport via ROW. NOTE: double auto carport with ROW access. Land: 5.49m x 45.72m (18" x 150") approx. A quality contemporary home with wonderful proportions offers effortless modern day inner city living!

You'd better believe it because here's living proof you actually can secure a stylishly renovated period residence without the costly upkeep in a prime Clifton Hill pocket. This sensational block-fronted Victorian has been cleverly enhanced to let the light in and leave high maintenance behind throughout a generous, split-level layout opening with bifold doors to a north-facing courtyard. Centrally located near Queens Parade, Brunswick/Smith Streets and their array of cafes and shops, Darling Gardens, schools and transport; this captivating cottage comprises two double bedrooms with built-in-robes (main to light court), gleaming bathroom, European laundry, light-filled living and dining area, stunning stone kitchen with Blanco appliances, reverse-cycle heating/cooling, alarm, surround-sound pre-wiring and polished floorboards.

Description:
Classic Clifton with a Contemporary Future
They don't offer them like this anymore. After exactly 50 years in the one family who went to the local school, worked down the street and watched the area transform, this classic double-fronted Edwardian is ready for the next generation to make a central village position their home. Situated on a large and level 406m2 allotment (approx) with ROW, the winds of change are ready to point this comfortable three bedroom with study home in a fresh new direction. Nestled by Merri Creek parklands, trails, cafes and train station, make the most of this coveted inner-city location and create a contemporary family haven (STCA) to fully enjoy the surroundings for the next 50 years. Offers living room with gas heating, functional kitchen/meals, central bathroom, laundry, polished floorboards, timber ceilings, open fireplaces, huge backyard, bungalow and garage.

Description:
With A Self-Contained Studio...
This unique opportunity is offered of a separate home and self-contained studio apartment. Work from home or accommodate extended family. The self-contained studio allows working from home and/or accommodation with mezzanine level, bathroom, kitchenette, ceiling fan and gas heating with telephone and tv connections. The double-glazed bi fold doors and windows overlook a sunny Japanese themed courtyard. The enchanting outdoor aspect is shared by the fully self-contained studio. A lovingly renovated free-standing Edwardian home flooded with natural light, comprising wide entry hall, two double bedrooms, sparkling central bathroom and mezzanine study/tv area above an open plan gourmet kitchen and entertaining area leading to large deck and a sunny courtyard with vegetable garden. Large storage area in roof is accessed via mezzanine level, foxtel and cable internet connections, tv connection in a number of rooms, ducted heating throughout, ceiling fans, solar power and plumbing in place for substantial size water tanks to be connected. Tools and garden shed. With the perfect neighbours, you will also love the location-close to extensive parklands, Merri Creek and Dights Falls, local cafes, supermarket and Queens Parade shops. Excellent public transport minutes away train, tram and bus. Primary and high schools close by as well as Collingwood Leisure Centre. Inspect today!
Peter Bennett : 0419 502 466

Description:
Expansive Edwardian with garden studio
This architect renovated double-fronted residence set in landscaped mature gardens with a large studio/home office offers Clifton Hill living at its very best, close to transport, Village cafes, the Darling Gardens and primary schools. Opening from its wide Baltic floored hallway are three very spacious bedrooms (main with a smart ensuite bathroom)-- all with quality built-in wardrobes and plantation shutters - and an elegant family bathroom with elevated bath and separate shower. A beautifully-proportioned central living room opens into the stylish Miele-equipped kitchen, adjoining an expansive dining and informal living room with skylight ceiling and double doors to the wide back verandah. To one side is a utility zone, comprising a walk-in pantry, laundry and drying cabinet. The back garden is sheer delight; planted with citrus and apple trees, it has a central lawn and raised vegetable beds, and contains a children's play house. To one side is a very substantial studio/home office with clerestory windows and a storage room. A right-of-way provides easy access to parking and a workshop. This captivating home combines period charm with contemporary style; its many features include a vast ladder-access attic storage area, open fireplaces to all principal rooms, custom-built cabinetry, ducted heating, split-system airconditioning, alarm and vacuum systems.
Insights: 2 Berry Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2013 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
EXPANSIVE DUAL-FRONTAGE EDWARDIAN
This extremely spacious residence, close to Village cafes, Queens Parade, station and schools, offers comfortable living now, with brilliant extension potential (STCA) on a deep allotment with wide side access and a separate entry from Berry Street. Comprising three double bedrooms from a wide return hallway, a well-proportioned living and dining room with French doors to the courtyard garden with off-street parking, a newly-fitted kitchen and central tiled bathroom, the property features 2kw solar power, Baltic floors, decorative period detail, gas heating and a zoned alarm system. Includes second frontage to Berry Street offering excellent Off Street Parking potential.

Description:
REFINED CONTEMPORARY DESIGN
This elegant residence designed by award-winning architects Cameron Neil and David Neil is characterised by free-flowing light-filled spaces, high ceilings and a seamle fusion between indoors and outdoors. Comprising two spacious bedrooms and a full-width study/3rd bedroom opening from a wide hallway, cleverly zoned living and dining areas open to a well-fitted timber kitchen, a tiled bathroom and separate laundry, this stylish property opens through glass doors to a bold floating deck and tranquil mature garden. Features include polished timber and concrete floors, an open fireplace, ducted heating, split-system airconditioning, ceiling storage and tank garden irrigation. Schools, parkland, Village cafes and Clifton Hill Station are within easy walking distance.

Description:
Space, Convenience and Parkland
A peaceful, secure and low-maintenance lifestyle awaits with this European-style town residence affording spacious living and a practical floorplan in a convenient inner-city parkland pocket. Offering three big bedrooms (main with ensuite, built-in-robe and study alcove, walk-in-robe and built-in-robe in the other two), separate living and dining rooms with new carpet throughout, well-appointed kitchen with granite bench tops, bathroom with twin vanity and separate toilet, powder room and concealed laundry, courtyard, plus prized double lock up garage. Also features loads of storage, alarm, central heating and cooling. Moments from sporting fields, bike/walking tracks and Dights Falls plus close to Spensley Street Village, Clifton Hill train station, Abbotsford Covenant, schools, freeway access and the CBD.
Note: No Owners Corporation
Leonard Siragusa : 0407 875 048
